attributes.action: Stop the errection on mobile phone masts beside schools
attributes.additional_details:
Stop mobile phone companies erecting GSM - R Masts
Responsible department: Department of Health

To prevent mobile phone comapnies erecting communication masts of up to 90ft high when ever and where ever they like. This is being done with planning permission, which is using out of date health and saftey studies based solely on asthetics and with no consideration for communities.
These masts represent a possible health danger to our children and future generations and until we have definitive evidence of their safety. we should err on the side of caution.This government wants to be open - well let it be open and stop this project.
